{{Infobox Company | company_name = HighPoint Technologies, Inc. | company_logo = [[Image:HighPointTechnologies logo.png]] | company_type = [[Public company]] | foundation = 1995 | location = [[Milpitas, CA]], [[USA]] | key_people = | area_served = | industry = [[Computer industry|Computer]] | products = [[Integrated Drive Electronics]], [[RAID Controllers]] | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | num_employees = Unknown | parent = | subsid = | homepage = [http://www.highpoint-tech.com/ www.highpoint-tech.com] | footnotes = }} '''HighPoint Technologies''' is a multi-channel [[SATA]] and [[RAID]] controller device manufacturer. The company was founded in 1995.<ref>{{cite web|title=About HighPoint|url=http://www.highpoint-tech.com/USA/profile.htm}} www.highpoint-tech.com</ref>
They make RocketRAID series of RAID cards.
==Operating System Support== [[Microsoft Windows]] * [[Windows 95]] * [[Windows 98]] * [[Windows Me]] * [[Windows 2000]] * [[Windows XP]] (and [[x86-64|x64]]) * [[Windows Server 2003]] and [[Windows Server 2008]] (and [[x86-64|x64]]) * [[Windows Vista]] (and [[x86-64|x64]])
[[Linux]] * [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora Core]] 1.0 - 10.0 ([[x86]] and [[x86-64]]) * [[Red Hat Enterprise Linux]] 5.0 ([[x86]] and [[x86-64]]) * Red Hat Enterprise Linux 3.0, 3.0 U1, 4.0, 4.0 U1/U2/U3/U4 * [[CentOS]] 3.0, 4.0, 5.0,5.3 * [[SUSE Linux]] 8.1/8.2 ([[i386]]), 9.0 - 10.1 ([[i386]] and [[x86-64]]) * [[SUSE Enterprise]] 9, SP2, SP3
[[BSD]] * [[FreeBSD]] versions 4.3 - 7.0
Other * [[Open Source Linux Driver]] * [[Mac OS X]] (certain card models only)
==See also== *[[Promise Technology]] *[[Adaptec]]
